title: 求问如何打开sx物品属性的饰品插件
author: mc2409363402
txt_content: 我在某侠上面开了个小服，求问如何打开sx的饰品，以前会太久没用忘记怎么开了，谢谢！

replies.author: fnfx
replies.txt_content:
配置文件中打开RegisterSlots:
  Enabled: true

replies.author: fnfx
replies.txt_content:
在配置文件中打开戒指
然后在游戏中输入sx displaySlot

replies.author: mc2409363402
replies.txt_content:
fnfx 发表于 2020-6-30 00:43
配置文件中打开RegisterSlots:
  Enabled: true
打开了他说没有开启额外的槽位
RandomString: trus
RepairItemValue: 3.5
RegisterSlots:
  Enabled: trus
  List:
  - 17#戒指槽#421
  - 26#项链槽#421
  - 35#项链槽#421
  Lock:
    Enabled: trus
    Name: '&7&o%SlotName%槽'

replies.author: fnfx
replies.txt_content:
mc2409363402 发表于 2020-6-30 18:26
打开了他说没有开启额外的槽位
RandomString: trus
RepairItemValue: 3.5
我把我配置发你你直接用吧
